title: My lol is freezing in game.
body:
{{champion:107}} Hello!
I have problem in the game when game start to freeze, randomly on every 2' (ping is 49ms).
I tried everything. 
Restart computer, replacement of components in my pc (RAM,HDD,GPU), new windows 7, reinstall game. .
Nothing helps.
**How do I solve the problem?**
Thank you.

replies.body: This could be a sign your Client isn't connecting to the Server! It's a pretty easy fix if you run through our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) and all the steps. If it continues after going through the steps, you'll grab some [Logs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743)  and head over to our [Tech Team](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

This just started happening to me this morning.  I got about 1 minute into the game and my whole machine locked up.  I rebooted and was able to get to the first turret when it froze again.  The league repair utility said my game was corrupt and it kept saying that every time I hit "ok".  I uninstalled the game and am now reinstalling it.
